title: Labrador Retriever Buddy leaves a perfect dry patch outline after staying put during a rainstorm
text:
A Labrador Retriever who didn't budge in pouring rain left a perfect dog-shaped outline on the pavement.

Paul Williams, from Newtown, Wales, had called Buddy inside when a sudden shower began last week.

But the laid-back pooch was happy to get soggy in the rain.

Buddy the Labrador Retriever didn't budge in pouring rain leaving behind a perfect dog-shaped outline on the pavement

His owner Paul Williams, from Newtown, Wales, had called Buddy inside when a sudden shower began last week

When it stopped pouring and Buddy got up, Mr Williams was tickled by the perfect dry patch that remained on the pavement.

Even the shape of Buddy's tail can be seen on the ground as a discarded dog toy lies next to it.

Mr Williams posted the picture of Buddy's outline online and was stunned when thousands of people started to comment.

He said: 'It's just a very funny photo and never expected such a great outline of him.

'But I'm so glad I took the photo now as it makes me smile every time I now look at it.

'It makes me happy that so many others have been able to take a little joy from it too.'

When it stopped pouring and Buddy got up, Mr Williams was tickled by the perfect dry patch that remained on the pavement

Mr Williams posted the picture of Buddy's outline online and was stunned when thousands of people started to comment

People took to the comments to share their thoughts on the hilarious picture.

Dan Freeman commented: 'Where's his head?'

Lynda Paton likened Buddy's outline to a chalk outline at a crime scene.

Some commenters said their dogs love the rain as much as Buddy, while Melanie Wallwork said her dog 'won't go out in the rain' and 'hates it'.
description: Paul Williams, from Newtown, Wales, had called Buddy inside as it rained but the hound didn't budge. Mr Williams was tickled by the perfect outline that remained on the pavement.
